title: Christchurch attacks: producer resigns from film They Are Us as criticism grows
content:
1. Christchurch attacks: producer resigns from film They Are Us as criticism grows  The Guardian
  2. Producer Pulls Out Of Christchurch Massacre Project Following Backlash, Jacinda Ardern Criticizes Movie  Deadline
  3. Ardern says NZ mosque attack film should focus on Muslim community not her  Reuters
  4. Mosque attacks film: Movies about politicians should not be taxpayer-funded  Stuff.co.nz
  5. It is, quite simply, wrong to insist that the tragic events of 15 March 2019 belong to anything, or anyone, but History itself, Chris Trotter argues  Interest.co.nz
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: クライストチャーチ同時多発テロ：批判が高まった映画「They Are Us」のプロデューサーが辞任
克赖斯特彻奇袭击事件：制片人因批评声不断而辞去电影《他们是我们》的职务
克賴斯特徹奇襲擊事件：製片人因批評聲不斷而辭去電影《他們是我們》的職務
